caption.p: Phylogenetic reconstruction and positioning of CHIKV genome obtained in this study using maximum likelihood. ( a) Full phylogeny including all available West African, East/Central/South African (ECSA)â€”Indian Ocean lineages and Asian/Caribbean using complete and draft genomes >8 kb. ( b) Phylogenetic analysis focusing on Brazilian genomes of a subset of ECSA and Asian/Caribbean CHIKV genomic sequences from the full CHIKV tree. ( c) Distribution of the number of CHIKV genomes sequenced per state. State colors follow tip colors in panel B.
